channel.title: Josh Perilo Presents: The Big O
channel.description: Josh Perilo takes us on a tour of the many tortured and complex characters that live in his hometown of Omaha, Nebraska. Follow Stephen, The Kirkster, John Blackstone, and others as their lives intertwine and intersect; every one of them grasping for something to call their own in a small town that gets smaller by the minute.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A cringing, yet humorous, tour of middle America.
channel.itunes:author: Josh Perilo
channel.itunes:summary: Josh Perilo takes us on a tour of the many tortured and complex characters that live in his hometown of Omaha, Nebraska. Follow Stephen, The Kirkster, John Blackstone, and others as their lives intertwine and intersect; every one of them grasping for something to call their own in a small town that gets smaller by the minute.

item.title: Lite at Nite
item.description: Donald Baxter Jackson is the host of the late night call in show, "Pillow Talk"... for the next couple weeks, at least. Policy changes at the station and ungrateful listeners drive Donald to the brink as he attempts to retain control of the console.
item.dc:creator: Josh Perilo
item.itunes:summary: Donald Baxter Jackson is the host of the late night call in show, "Pillow Talk"... for the next couple weeks, at least. Policy changes at the station and ungrateful listeners drive Donald to the brink as he attempts to retain control of the console.
